title: Brooklyn Holt
text:
The University of Alberta School of Business offers a strong Finance program that blends rigorous academics with practical application. We focus on student-directed learning, reflecting real workplace dynamics. We equip our students with enterprise-level financial tools and insights, guided by professors who bring a wealth of experience. The advanced courses in our program focus on the ability to frame real-life problems, use Finance concepts and theory, and solve them using Enterprise-level data science tools.
We encourage each other to be inquisitive, embrace challenges, and value continuous learning. Mentorship and teamwork are cornerstones of our curriculum, preparing us for diverse roles in finance.



I am a detail-oriented person who thrives in situations requiring intense examination. Whether it’s analyzing data sets or refining projects, I am energized by the challenge of leaving no stone unturned. This mindset drives me to research new topics and ensure a thorough understanding of every aspect of the task at hand. In addition to my detail-oriented nature, I believe that time is a precious resource not to be wasted. As a punctual person, I approach deadlines and daily commitments efficiently, respecting not only my time but also that of others. My background in customer service helped me develop a calm and rational approach to problem-solving. I approach challenges logically, weighing facts and considering multiple perspectives. This helps me beyond problem-solving but also in maintaining a level-headed approach to all aspects of life.
